findings.liver: Hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits, contour of the liver is smooth, no focal liver mass, main portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow, no ascites.
findings.bile_ducts: Mild intrahepatic biliary dilation, evidence of pneumobilia within the left hepatic lobe, stent identified traversing the common hepatic duct.
findings.gallbladder: Gallbladder appears distended with wall thickening and edema, no stones present.
findings.pancreas: Numerous calcifications without pancreatic duct dilation.
findings.kidneys: Limited views of right kidney show no hydronephrosis.
findings.retroperitoneum: Visualized portions of aorta and IVC are within normal limits.
